data.text: We are glad to connect with other aviation professionals participating in the @CAPA_Aviation World Aviation Summit 2022, where our CEO @Gaussm took part in a keynote interview and a panel discussion: https://t.co/a7IlWIRefE https://t.co/pq3Mxp7zMT

urls.title: airBaltic Net Profit of EUR 17.1 Million in Q3 of 2022
urls.description: The pre-exceptional net income for the third quarter of 2022 has grown to EUR 17.1 million.

data.text: In the first nine months of 2022, airBaltic group has recorded positive business indicators and achieved EUR 362.5 million in revenue - 172% more than in 2021. The pre-exceptional net income for the third quarter of 2022 has grown to EUR 17.1 million: https://t.co/aV4nWD3SGk https://t.co/9j0Encw5d1

urls.title: Top Winter Destinations – Vienna, Munich and Tenerife
urls.description: Reservations during the period of the winter solstice and New Year have reached more than 60%, compared to the year before.

data.text: The most popular destinations for the upcoming winter season are Vienna, Munich and Tenerife! 🌍 At the same time, London, Paris, Copenhagen and Amsterdam remain among the most popular year-round routes ✈️ Read more about travel during the holiday season: https://t.co/4jDmMe0ly9 https://t.co/mPZNpIpV5I

@coocho Good morning. This is indeed very unfortunate and we apologize for the inconveniences and cancelled flight.
This is due to technical reasons. Passenger safety is and always will be our priority number one.

urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community
urls.description: Discover unique and original NFT Planie artwork created by airBaltic. Buy, sell and trade special cartoon aircraft design collection of 10 000 digital collectibles stored on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain and enjoy travel benefits as part of airBaltic Club loyalty program.

data.text: More than a million airBaltic Club loyalty points have been issued for @PlaniesNFT! ✈️ Since the launch over 2300 Planies have been purchased. After being staked on the staking platform, the owners have passively earned points & other benefits. Check out: https://t.co/sJsm9vnZmL https://t.co/I7t1c9sZUD

data.text: Atzīmējot Latvijas Republikas proklamēšanas 104. gadadienu, ar patiesu godu piedalīsimies svinīgajā parādē, veicot unikālu zemo pārlidojumu pāri Daugavai! Pavisam drīz mūsu piloti veiks lidojumu ar mūsu Airbus A220-300 sarkanbaltsarkanajā krāsojumā virs Rīgas - skaties augšup!🇱🇻 https://t.co/Kdk72kuidn

Ar siltāko mīlestību sirdī sveicam Latvijas tautu Neatkarības dienā! ♥️ Ik dienas celsim sarkanbalti sarkano karogu arvien augstāk - saules mūžu mūsu zemei šodien un vienmēr! 🇱🇻 https://t.co/5meMKPrOxD

@JorshLv @Iberia Labdien! Esam sarūgtināti dzirdēt par šādu situāciju, atvainojamies par to. Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā privāti atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par konkrēto lidojuma maršrutu un veiktajiem lidojumiem? Sapratīsim un atbildēsim, kur Jums griezties šajā gadījumā.

data.text: Today 13 students finished their studies at the airBaltic Pilot Academy, receiving a commercial pilot license 🎓 In addition, we welcomed 15 new students, who began their professional pilot studies. @suvealgus @Gaussm Correct!

data.text:
@AneteHorelika Thanks for the clarification, as on your first tweets you mentioned particularly RIX-AMS.
There are no one-way prices advertised from Amsterdam in this campaign, but a roundtrip offer available for EUR 100 (AMS-RIX-AMS), here's an example: https://t.co/khZQE6NRVt
@AneteHorelika You chose a round-trip flight option, not a one-way. Here's a video on how to choose a one-way on our webpage and find those EUR 27 fares, they are real! https://t.co/c8WZ1JRLt6
@AneteHorelika On your previously sent screenshots you have chosen a round-trip (not a one-way) and in such cases price for both flights is calculated together, based on your chosen departure date.
@AneteHorelika Please choose the one-way flight on our webpage, and then you will see this amazing price. Our screenshot sent above is taken few minutes ago.
@AneteHorelika As for the round-trip, very good availability: https://t.co/yXt9dvwhG7
@AneteHorelika Well, we can definitely confirm that one-way on this route is not usually available for EUR 26.99. :)) https://t.co/hNCnc5bq0F

@AneteHorelika Hi! We call it GRABOUT as it offers the best prices for all our flights next year! Many social media users will confirm. :)
Please note that it is already fourth day of the sale and many destinations are already sold out. May we ask, in which one particular are you interested in?

urls.title: Grabout 2023 has started!
urls.description: Flights to all airBaltic destinations are now available at incredibly cheap prices.

data.text: Our grand sale GRABOUT 2023 is still surprising people with its amazing deals! 🤩 The hottest destinations might be sold out, however, there are many gems still waiting for adventure seekers ✈️ Is one of these calling your name? 👀 Check out: https://t.co/dyVew3MpTY https://t.co/2A5LvvEiTf
@an1tagraudina 💚💚💚

@AivarsTennisLV Hello! Currently no plans on 3 daily rotations from Riga!
However on top of this, we are also performing 4x weekly direct flights from Tallinn and Vilnius to Paris next summer season.
@atana77 Hello! Please DM us privately more details, such as your booking reference number. We will check!

@medicus_she Labdien! Atvainojamies par lidojuma kavēšanos, kā arī mūsu pārstāvju darbību lidostā.
Jau pavisam drīz būsim ceļā - plānotā izlidošana 15:55.

Šodien kopā ar partneriem īstenosim pilna mēroga ārkārtas situācijas apmācības starptautiskajā lidostā “Liepāja”. Tajās pārbaudīsim sadarbību starp lidsabiedrību, lidostu un valsts ārkārtas dienestiem - apmācības airBaltic ikdienas darbību neietekmēs: https://t.co/rtoi1n0PI7 https://t.co/HaM5Sm1iQb

urls.title: airBaltic and Liepāja Airport to Host Emergency Response Training
urls.description: The goal of it is to examine the cooperation with airport and all State emergency services.

data.text:
During our most spectacular sale GRABOUT 2023, our airBaltic club members can earn 5x more points! 💚

✈️ Multiple destinations with outstanding prices are still available: https://t.co/T4njynOiDL https://t.co/OLbcFxMXVA

urls.title: airBaltic piedāvā plašu apmaksas veidu klāstu
urls.description: Vai zināji, ka aviobiļešu apmaksu vari veikt daļās? Pasažieriem piedāvājam dažādas apmaksas iespējas. Uzzini par tām te, airBaltic.com

data.text: @Vitenav @Ikars @PTACgovLV Lūdzam ņemt vērā, ka cena turp-atpakaļ lidojumiem tiek atainota un rēķināta balstoties uz izlidošanas datumu. Pirmajā ekrānšāviņā izlidošanas datums ir 24.04, otrajā (cik saprotam, nav izvēlēts), trešajā ekrānšāviņā - 23.04. Tāpēc arī cenu atšķirības.
@Ikars @PTACgovLV Biļetes bija pieejamas katrā airBaltic lidojumā (norādītajā akcijas periodā) sākoties mūsu 2023.gada visķeršanai. Taču, tās tiek pirktas, kas nozīmē, ka to pieejamība samazinās. :)

@Ikars @PTACgovLV Šodien ir akcijas otrā diena, un daudzos no populārākajiem galamērķiem akcijas biļetes vairs pieejamas tikai limitētā daudzumā.

Ja nepieciešama palīdzība lidojumu meklēšanā, ar lielāko prieku būsim priecīgi atrast labākās lidojumu opcijas! https://t.co/4vjeR3R6Z9
@Ikars @PTACgovLV Labdien, Ikar. Vai varam lūgt, kurā no mūsu galamērķiem esiet ieinteresēts un meklējiet akcijas biļetes un cenas?
@jegerpizza Hello! Currently our webpage does not offer such option.

@statsguyuk @British_Airways Hello, Adam!
You should use our (airBaltic) check-in desk for this flight. Please check the airport screens for all the desk information.

@puucha Labdien! Saprotam sarūgtinājumu, taču biļetes daudzos no galamērķiem tiek burtiski "izķertas". Tāpat arī turp-atpakaļ lidojumu cenas var būt izdevīgākas, kā cenas atsevišķiem vienvirziena atpakaļlidojumiem (piemēram, tikai no Porto uz Rīgu).
@alinerosenthal Tiekamies nākamgad! https://t.co/GnV3GrAvpq
@_skabarga @VilhelmsM Lieliski! Tiekamies uz klāja nākamgad! 💚
@cappytude @VilhelmsM 🏔🏔🏔 https://t.co/TMCChOaONw

@krrystyne @VilhelmsM Labdien! Aktivitāte ir tiešām milzīga. Ja neesiet ar mums jau sazinājusies citā kanālā, lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par lidojumiem, ko iegādājāties, kā arī ekrānšāviņu no interneta bankas par transakciju. Pārbaudīsim ar tehnisko komandu.

urls.title: Flights to Gran Canaria| airBaltic
urls.description: Book cheap flights from Riga to Gran Canaria with airBaltic. Take a short, direct flight from Riga to Gran Canaria and experience all that Gran Canarias has to offer!

data.text: Another great news for our passengers - today we had our first-ever flight to Gran Canaria! 🌴 A new addition to our island jewels, it is the perfect getaway for Atlantic coast lovers 🥰️ Direct flights are available twice a week: https://t.co/wV8Z94v9Gm https://t.co/H7Xx6zQTXa

urls.title: Flights to Marrakesh | airBaltic
urls.description: Book cheap flights from Riga to Marrakesh with airBaltic. Take a short, direct flight from Riga to Marrakesh and experience all that Morocco has to offer!

data.text: Join the grand opening of our first-ever flight to Africa, the spectacular Marrakesh! 🇲🇦 This new destination will steal the 💚 of any nature lover, adventure seeker, and culture fan! The pearl of North Africa can be reached with a direct ✈️ twice a week: https://t.co/Uwr1jHiQdl https://t.co/XDZoAf0DY9

urls.title: Live Flight Tracker - Real-Time Flight Tracker Map | Flightradar24
urls.description: View flight BT775 from Riga to Marrakesh on Flightradar24

data.text: 👉 Come along and follow our first flight to Marrakesh on @Flightradar24 here: https://t.co/cuhIWcoFgD

Our crew is ready for the first airBaltic flight to Marrakesh, Morocco! ✈️🇲🇦 This moment also marks our first-ever scheduled flight to Africa, and to make it even more special, First Officer Hicham will perform this flight to his home country 💚 https://t.co/tnLK9Pe9lv
